SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameBoard extends Object implements Serializable
GameBoard class represents the board of the game. It contains the decks of cards and the common cards.
See Also:
